title: Brunias Free Women of Color Image MCQ 4

content.prompt: Which of the following most directly led to the arrival of substantial numbers of Africans in the Americas at the time of the painting?

choices.label: The collapse of the Inca and Aztec Empires as a result of Spanish invasion
The growth of industrial production in the United States
The expansion of the plantation system for growing sugarcane and other crops
The development of large-scale silver mining operations in South America

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
